subject: Re: Eugene PD x Flock - next steps
body:
Thank you!! 

You may be getting tricked since it has been dry for a few days ??.  It is certainly a great place to live. 

Get Outlook for iOS https://aka.ms/o0ukef 
________________________________

From: Caroline Fraher <caroline.fraher@flocksafety.com>
Sent: Thursday, January 16, 2025 7:13:04 PM
To: BURKE Jacob T <JBurke@eugene-or.gov>
Cc: DEWITT Derek A <DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov>; Kevin Jung <kevin.jung@flocksafety.com>
Subject: Re: Eugene PD x Flock - next steps 
 

[EXTERNAL ?]

Thank YOU! It�s been fun to see Eugene too! I think I�m ready to move here! I love it. 

See below for tech question clarification:


1.	On the attached spreadsheet question #7 says: Security documents require a signed NDA so hard copy is not able to be provided. The link provided will unlock the PDF's with a page to digitally sign NDA. We were unable to find the link. Can someone please provide it? 
	https://console.whistic.com/v2/request-profile/3c67417e-cc0b-4ec4-a2db-45d3f2066ad1/77280c5d-1d09-4cfc-8788-bff5c86e9ba8 https://console.whistic.com/v2/request-profile/3c67417e-cc0b-4ec4-a2db-45d3f2066ad1/77280c5d-1d09-4cfc-8788-bff5c86e9ba8 
2.	

	*	Do they have additional information about their update schedule or release timeline?
		Flock Safety pushes out updates on an as-needed basis with no set timeline. 



On Thu, Jan 16, 2025 at 6:04?PM BURKE Jacob T <JBurke@eugene-or.gov JBurke@eugene-or.gov > wrote:


	Caroline, 

	Special thanks  to you and and your team for being so flexible and willing to travel and present to our team and partners.  

	I will look at the dates and send you some times that work best for the meetings and follow up with the Chief about b our conversation after the demo.  

	I�m the meantime, can you do me a favor and re-send the responses to the two questions from our IT department?  I looked through my email and didn�t see the response.  

	Thank you 

	Get Outlook for iOS https://aka.ms/o0ukef 
________________________________

	From: Caroline Fraher <caroline.fraher@flocksafety.com caroline.fraher@flocksafety.com >
	Sent: Thursday, January 16, 2025 5:12:05 PM
	To: BURKE Jacob T <JBurke@eugene-or.gov JBurke@eugene-or.gov >; DEWITT Derek A <DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov >
	Subject: Eugene PD x Flock - next steps 
	 

	[EXTERNAL ?]

	Hi Captain Burke and Detective DeWitt,

	Thank you again for today! We are so appreciative of the opportunity to present to you, Lane Co, and Springfield, and are excited to partner with you on your real time policing tech efforts. 

	As a follow up, I propose we have two separate meetings (in no particular order)

	Meeting 1- review camera map deployment to determine locations and final cost. 
	Crunching some numbers, with $330k to spend over 2 years, that gives us 55ish cameras, give or take depending on installation and Falcon type. I am going to have my team cross reference Springfield's camera map to see which ones are on your border. I'll send that list over by EOD tomorrow. 

	Here is the camera map we put together earlier this year. We will better organize the deployment as we work through finalizing your location selections. Seth and I are available to meet to go over the map:
	Tuesday 1/21 - 11am, 12pm, 3pm
	Wed 1/22 anytime between 12-3:30
	Friday 1/24 anytime after 12 
	The following week we are going to Atlanta for a company meeting but could meet on Thursday or Friday. 
	
	
	Meeting 2 - discuss procurement w/ finance, discuss legal review, and gameplan for council/community engagement 
	Tuesday 1/21- anytime
	Wednesday 1/22 - anytime after 12
	Thursday -1/23 anytime before 1:30pm
	1/24 Friday anytime

	If you could please let me know what works best for you, I can send the calendar invites. Thank you!


	
 <https://d36urhup7zbd7q.cloudfront.net/e/bc3890fd-3467-438b-8979-68f071c011ec.png> 	
Caroline Fraher
Territory Sales Manager

 https://sales.flocksafety.com/t/102869/sc/0712e7ca-1d3b-44a4-8c3f-99806d767849/NB2HI4DTHIXS653XO4XGY2LONNSWI2LOFZRW63JPMNXW24DBNZ4S6ZTMN5RWWLLTMFTGK5DZ/HFQWIMRQGQ4WIODDGFTDSM3EHFRDAYRXGEYWEMBUMRSDQNJWHA4TANJZGAYGEY3C/www-linkedin-com-company-flock-safety 

 https://sales.flocksafety.com/t/102869/sc/0712e7ca-1d3b-44a4-8c3f-99806d767849/NB2HI4DTHIXS653XO4XGS3TTORQWO4TBNUXGG33NF5TGY33DNNZWCZTFOR4S6===/MFTDKYZSGFTGMODGGBSTOYZUGZQTKMRUMU3GIMLGMU3WGYLCMRTGCZRSGI2DCNJV/www-instagram-com-flocksafety 

 https://sales.flocksafety.com/t/102869/sc/0712e7ca-1d3b-44a4-8c3f-99806d767849/NB2HI4DTHIXS653XO4XGMYLDMVRG633LFZRW63JPMZWG6Y3LONQWMZLUPE======/MZRWCNBYGE4DSYZXGY3TIMBUG43GMZJZGJSWMYLDMFRTMZBSME2TGNBSGRRTGNRZ/www-facebook-com-flocksafety 

 https://sales.flocksafety.com/t/102869/sc/0712e7ca-1d3b-44a4-8c3f-99806d767849/NB2HI4DTHIXS653XO4XHS33VOR2WEZJOMNXW2L3DF5DGY33DNNJWCZTFOR4Q====/GUYWIZBZMVRWMNBSGQ3WGMJZGZTDAZRUG5TDGNTFGMYDMNZXG5SGGNZYHAYTINBT/www-youtube-com-c-flocksafety 

 <https://cdn.gifo.wisestamp.com/s/rfm1/108062/26/trans.png>  310-844-3659 call/text <tel:310-844-3659call/text>    <https://cdn.gifo.wisestamp.com/s/rfw4/108062/26/trans.png>  flocksafety.com

 <https://cdn.gifo.wisestamp.com/s/rfcustom/108062/26/trans.png>  caroline.fraher@flocksafety.com caroline.fraher@flocksafety.com 

	
 <https://d36urhup7zbd7q.cloudfront.net/u/Qowpxb7DNle/1683134561052.png>

	As a follow up, I propose we have two separate meetings (in no particular order)
